name: The 23rd Psalm Quiz | Old Testament / Tanakh | 10 Questions

questions.text: Fill in the blank from the New King James Version. 'The LORD is my Shepherd I shall not _______'?
What type of pastures does the Shepherd make the Psalmist 'lie down in', according to the New King James Version?
'He leads me beside __________ waters'. What goes in the blank in the New King James Version?
What does the Psalmist say the Shepherd does to 'my soul' in the New King James Version?
What types of paths does the Psalmist say the Shepherd leads him in, according to the New King James Version?
'Yea, though I walk through the _________________'. What goes in the blank in the New King James Version?
questions.correct: valley of the shadow of death
options: valley of the shadow of temptation
questions.explanation:
valley of the shadow of death.

	Psalm 23:4

questions.text: In whose presence does the Psalmist say the Shepherd prepares him a table, according to the New King James Version?
What does the Shepherd anoint the Psalmist's head with according to the New King James Version?
The Psalmist says the two things will 'follow me all the days of my life' in the New King James Version. What are they?
'I will dwell in the house of the Lord __________'. What goes in the blank in the NKJV?
